days.title: Arrival in Osaka
days.tagline: From Polish plains to electric neon dreams

food.recommendation: Dotonbori okonomiyaki or takoyaki near Ebisu Bridge

days.tip: Get a prepaid IC card (ICOCA) at the airport for seamless train/bus travel

days.title: Kyoto's Golden Temples & Bamboo
days.tagline: Where monks whisper secrets to golden pavilions
highlights: {'name': 'Hotel Check-in & Dinner', 'time': '17:00+', 'cost': 'Hotel: ~16,500 JPY/room, Dinner: ~2,000 JPY pp'}

transport.cost: 3,600 JPY pp (included in JR Pass if purchased)

days.tip: Wear comfortable walking shoes; Fushimi Inari alone is 2+ hours of stairs

days.title: Kyoto's Historic Heart
days.tagline: Tea ceremonies and philosopher's paths through ancient temples

food.recommendation: Nishiki Market fresh sushi and specialty items

days.tip: Book tea ceremony the day before; arrive Nishiki Market mid-afternoon for better crowds

days.title: Nara's Deer Park & Osaka Castle
days.tagline: Bowing deer and towering castles in the Kansai ring
days.tip: Deer at Nara park bow for crackers! Buy from vendors at park entrance

days.title: Hiroshima Peace & Miyajima Island
days.tagline: Sacred gates and stories of resilience reflected in calm waters
highlights: {'name': 'Floating Torii Gate & Island Exploration', 'time': '14:00-16:30', 'cost': 'Free (shrine donation ~300 JPY)'}
{'name': 'Return to Hiroshima & Dinner', 'time': '17:00-19:00', 'cost': 'Hotel: ~17,000 JPY/room, Dinner: ~2,500 JPY pp'}

food.recommendation: Hassei okonomiyaki (Hiroshima-style) or oyster dishes near Miyajima

days.tip: Visit Miyajima at high tide (torii appears to float); check tide times online

days.title: Fukuoka's Coastal Charm
days.tagline: From canals to yatai stalls: modern Japan meets street food magic
highlights: {'name': 'Yatai Food Stalls at Nakasu', 'time': '18:30-20:30', 'cost': '3,000-4,000 JPY pp (multiple small bowls of ramen)'}

food.recommendation: Hakata ramen at yatai stalls (Tonkotsu style)

days.tip: Yatai stalls are most lively 19:00-21:00; book ahead or arrive early for limited seating

days.title: Kumamoto Day Trip
days.tagline: Medieval castles and fiery cuisine in the heart of Kyushu
highlights: {'name': 'Local Cuisine: Basashi & Karashi Renkon', 'time': '13:00-14:30', 'cost': '2,500-3,500 JPY pp'}

activities.name: Local Specialty Dining
activities.note: Basashi (raw horse meat) and karashi renkon (spicy lotus root)

food.recommendation: Basashi (raw horse meat), Karashi renkon, Ramen

days.tip: Basashi is Kumamoto's specialty; brave travelers shouldn't miss it. If not interested, excellent ramen alternatives

days.title: Journey to Mount Fuji
days.tagline: From Kyushu heat to alpine cool: chasing Japan's iconic peak
highlights: {'name': 'Fuji Subaru Line Bus to Kawaguchiko', 'time': '13:30-14:30', 'cost': '2,000 JPY pp'}

activities.name: Fuji Subaru Line Bus
activities.note: Scenic mountain drive with forest views

food.recommendation: Hoto noodles (local specialty at Lake Kawaguchiko)

days.tip: This is a long travel day (~5.5 hours total); use it to relax, nap, and prepare for Fuji views tomorrow

days.title: Mount Fuji & Five Lakes
days.tagline: Chase morning light on Japan's most sacred peak and pristine alpine lakes
highlights: {'name': 'Return to hotel for breakfast', 'time': '08:00-09:00', 'cost': 'Breakfast included or ~1,500 JPY'}
{'name': 'Oshino Hakkai Traditional Village', 'time': '13:00-14:30', 'cost': 'Free to explore (some shops have fees)'}

activities.name: Oshino Hakkai Village
activities.note: Historic thatched-roof farmhouses, clear spring water

food.recommendation: Hoto Fudo hoto noodles, fresh spring water

days.tip: Chureito sunrise hike requires very early departure (05:00); weather dependent for Fuji visibility

days.title: Return to Osaka
days.tagline: From mountain quiet to city energy: markets, malls, and sunset towers
highlights: {'name': 'Bus & Shinkansen back to Osaka', 'time': '09:00-13:30', 'cost': '12,000 JPY pp'}
{'name': 'Kuromon Market Exploration', 'time': '15:00-16:30', 'cost': '2,000-3,000 JPY pp (fresh food sampling)'}

food.recommendation: Fresh sushi or seafood at Kuromon Market

days.tip: Time Umeda Sky Building visit for sunset (around 18:45 in late April) for dramatic lighting

days.title: Osaka's Modern & Marine
days.tagline: Sea creatures and street style in Japan's most energetic city
highlights: {'name': 'Farewell Dinner at Fine Restaurant', 'time': '18:00-20:00', 'cost': '4,500-6,000 JPY pp (kaiseki or omakase)'}

activities.name: Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan
activities.note: Giant Pacific Ocean tank with whale shark

activities.name: Amerikamura Shopping
activities.note: Trendy youth fashion, vintage, street culture

food.recommendation: Kaiseki (multi-course fine dining) or omakase sushi for farewell

days.tip: Reserve upscale restaurant 1-2 days ahead for farewell dinner; Michelin-listed options available

days.title: Departure
days.tagline: Sayonara, Japan‚Äîmemories packed tighter than a suitcase
highlights: {'name': 'Taxi to Kansai International Airport', 'time': '11:30-12:15', 'cost': '3,000-4,000 JPY (group share ~500 JPY pp)'}

food.recommendation: Airport terminal restaurants or final meal in Osaka if time allows

days.tip: Arrive at airport 3 hours early; book airport transport night before

jrPassAnalysis.recommendation: 14-day JR Pass ‚Äî saves significantly on this route
jrPassAnalysis.note: Covers all shinkansen (Hikari/Sakura), JR local trains, Miyajima ferry

transport.suicaCard: Get ICOCA at KIX ‚Äî works nationwide for local trains, buses, konbini

takkyubin.how: Send from hotel or konbini to next hotel

bookings.note: Exchange at KIX airport on arrival
3 rooms per city. Book flexible rate.
Via FRA or WAW. Book early for best prices.
Pick up at KIX airport. 1 device per 2-3 people.

JR Pass (14-day).note: Covers all shinkansen and JR trains

Food.note: Mix of street food, restaurants, konbini

budget.note: Excluding international flights (est. 3,000-5,000 PLN pp WRO‚ÜíKIX). JR Pass is the single best investment.

osaka.purpose: Kansai base ‚Äî Dotonbori, Namba, day trips

options.name: Hotel Kanra Kyoto
options.pickReason: Perfect blend of modern comfort and Japanese aesthetic

options.name: Sheraton Grand Hiroshima
options.pickReason: Direct station access ‚Äî perfect for 1-night stays

fukuoka.purpose: Kyushu base ‚Äî yatai, Kumamoto day trip

options.name: Hotel Okura Fukuoka
options.pickReason: Walk to yatai stalls and Canal City ‚Äî ideal Fukuoka base

options.name: Fuji Lake Hotel
options.pickReason: Wake up to Mt Fuji views from your room. Onsen included.

travels.details: Hikari or Sakura trains covered by JR Pass
Long travel day: Shinkansen to Mishima, then Fujikyu bus to Kawaguchiko
Bus to Mishima, shinkansen to Osaka

restaurants.note: Curated restaurant picks for each city

spots.name: Hoto Fudo
spots.cuisine: Hoto noodles (flat wheat noodles in miso broth)
